yacl3.config.mop.title: Mop
yacl3.config.mop.category.input.group.an: Allows pressing ENTER to confirm your input in anvil inputs.
yacl3.config.mop.category.input.group.si: Allows pressing ENTER to confirm your input in sign inputs.
yacl3.config.mop.category.input.group.ch: Opens chat automatically when Housing asks for chat input.
Includes the previous value for an input in the chat box, highlighted.
